data.meta_description: Get connected to your customersâ water and take your service model to the next level!  Deliver unparalleled service to your residential customers with the Pentaâ¦
data.text:
Get connected to your customersâ water and take your service model to the next level! Deliver unparalleled service to your residential customers with the Pentair Pro app and trusted Pentair water solutions technology thatâs smarter than ever.

Pentair Pro: the digital toolbox keeping you one step ahead. Deliver trusted performance and reliability with smart Pentair water devices to help your customers to move, improve and enjoy their home water. Use the Pentair Pro app as one more way to:

BECOME A TRUSTED PARTNER

â¢ Remotely monitor & receive alerts: Use the dashboard to get systems history, instant status and alerts from customersâ connected devices, anytime, anywhere

â¢ Deliver peace of mind: Proactively inform customers when equipment needs attention

SAVE TIME, GROW REVENUE

â¢ Reduce time on service calls: Get system info from the devices to diagnose and monitor from afar

â¢ Generate new leads and sales: Pro Locator on the Pentair Home app allows homeowners to find you for products and service

â¢ Get support from Pentair with online manuals, videos and other resources

The Pentair Pro app currently works with the following Pentair Home connected water devices:

â¢ FOR POOL AND SPA:

INTELLIFLO 3 VARIABLE SPEED PUMP: The only pump with patented sensorless flow control and smart device control for optimal performance and efficiency.

INTELLISYNC POOL PUMP CONTROL: Help homeowners keep energy bills in check by controlling variable speed pump settings from a smart device.

CHEMCHECK WATER QUALITY MONITORING SYSTEM*: Effortless, hands-free testing to stay on top of pool water chemistry, monitoring pH, sanitizer performance & temperature.

INTELLICONNECT SYSTEM*: No more trips to the pool pad to adjust equipment settings! Homeowners can monitor, schedule and control up to five pool devices like pumps, heaters, lights and sanitizers.

COLORSYNC LED LIGHT CONTROLLER: Create dazzling light shows from seven existing themes and five colors. Compatible with all Pentair Color LED lights.

â¢

FOR WATER TREATMENT:

HOME CONNECTED WATER SOFTENER*: Sends automatic alerts for remote trouble shooting. Low salt alerts allow you to see which customers need salt refill services. Tell customers when to regenerate, before a scheduled service call.

â¢ FOR HOME WATER SUPPLY & DISPOSAL:

TRILARM LEAK DETECTOR: Detects leaks, temperature changes & power outages anywhere a leak could occur.

SUMP PUMP SMART BATTERY BACKUP: Powerful plug-n-play battery operated unit to support main sump pump system during power outages, rising water levels and pump failure.

DEFENDER WELL SYSTEM CONTROLLER*: Detects issues and sends alerts for common system problems like tank malfunctions and pump dry run. Smart shut-off when potentially damaging conditions are detected. Compatible with many well systems.

INTELLIDRIVE WATER PRESSURE CONTROL CENTER* : Helps maintain strong, constant water pressure in your home, regardless of how many people or appliances are using water at the same time.

For product details and more information, please visit pentair.com/pro

The Pentair Pro app supports most of the mobile devices. Some features may not be supported in different smart devices. Some features require a working internet connection, WIFI and/or Bluetooth. Use of app is subject to Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

*Products that can be monitored by Pentair Pro upon homeownerâs consent. Ability to send information to Professional is optional and dependent on product feature availability.

**Ability to get product alerts dependent on user opting in to receive alerts and also dependent on product feature availability.

ABOUT PENTAIR: From great tasting water straight from the kitchen faucet, to industrial water management and everywhere in between, we bring water to life. Our smart, sustainable water solutions help people move, improve and enjoy water, the world over.
